column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType

#Text=Main Aang Katara Mechanist Sokka Teo Antagonists Fire Nation soldiers Qin says : " Minor Appa Earth Kingdom colonists Momo Storyteller " Katara says : " This should give us a good idea of what 's around here . "
#Text=Sokka says : " See if you can find a menu , I 'm starving ! "
#Text=Aang says : " I bet we 'll find something to eat here , the Fire Day 's Festival .
#Text=Look at this .
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , a poster of me !
#Text=" Sokka says : " A wanted poster !
#Text=This is bad .
#Text=" Katara says : " I think we better keep moving .
#Text=" Aang says : " I have to learn firebending at some point and this could be my only chance to watch a master 's up close .
#Text=" Katara says : " I guess we could go check it out .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What ?
#Text=You wan na walk into a Fire Nation town where they 're all fired - up with their ... you know , fire ?
#Text=" Katara says : " We 'll wear disguises and if it looks like trouble , we 'll leave .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah !
#Text=Because we always leave before we get into trouble .
#Text=" Aang says : " You guys stay out of sight here while we go to the festival .
#Text=Ready disguises !
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's like you 're a whole different person ... " Aang says : " Let 's go .
#Text=" Katara says : " I think we need some new disguises .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Where are we gon na get masks like that ?
#Text=" Mask dealer says : " Get your genuine Fire Festival masks here !
#Text=" Sokka says : " That was surprisingly easy .
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , there 's some food .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Finally !
#Text=What do you have ?
#Text=" Shop keeper says : " Flaming fire flakes !
#Text=Best in town .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'll take'em !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aaahhh !
#Text=Hot !
#Text=Hot !
#Text=" Katara says : " " Flaming fire flakes " , hot ?
#Text=What do you know ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , look at this .
#Text=" Puppet Fire Lord says : " Do n't worry loyal citizens !
#Text=No one can surprise the Fire Lord !
#Text=" Fire Nation kids says : " Oh no !
#Text=Look out !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , hold on !
#Text=Where are we going ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know , but there 's a big crowd so it must be good .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Knowing the Fire Nation , it 's probably an execution .
#Text=" Aang says : " I got ta learn that trick !
#Text=" Malu says : " Thank you !
#Text=For my next trick I need a volunteer from the audience !
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh !
#Text=Oh !
#Text=Me !
#Text=Me !
#Text=" Sokka says : " What do you think you 're doing ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I want to get a closer look .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's better that we do n't attract any attention to ourselves .
#Text=" Malu says : " How about you , little lady ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Uh .
#Text=" Malu says : " Awww , she 's shy .
#Text=Leeet 's give her some encouragement , folks !
#Text=" Aang says : " Awww !
#Text=That could 've been me .
#Text=" Malu says : " This next trick is called " Taming the Dragon . "
#Text=You will be my captured princess !
#Text=Do n't worry , young maiden !
#Text=I will tame this fiery beast !
#Text=It 's too strong , I ca n't hold it !
#Text=" Aang says : " We got ta help her !
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , we do n't want to make a scene !
#Text=" Malu says : " The rope , it 's breaking !
#Text=Hey , you tryin ' to upstage me , kid ?
#Text=" Citizen says : " Hey !
#Text=That kid 's the Avatar !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I think it 's time to go .
#Text=" Chey says : " Follow me !
#Text=I can get you outta here !
#Text=" Guard says : " There they are !
#Text=" Guard says : " Over there !
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm calling Appa .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I hope he can really hear that bison whistle !
#Text=" Chey says : " This way !
#Text=Okay !
#Text=Not this way !
#Text=" Aang says : " Appa !
#Text=Down here !
#Text=" Aang says : " Nice touch setting off the fireworks .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You really know your explosives ... " Chey says : " I 'm familiar .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You 're a Fire Nation Soldier !
#Text=" Chey says : " Was .
#Text=My name 's Chey .
#Text=" Chey says : " I serve a man .
#Text=More than a man really , he 's a myth , but he 's real , a living legend , Jeong Jeong the Deserter .
#Text=He was a Fire Nation general , or wait , was he an admiral ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " He was very highly ranked , we get it .
#Text=" Chey says : " Yeah !
#Text=Way up there !
#Text=But he could n't take the madness any more .
#Text=He 's the first person ever to leave the army - and live .
#Text=I 'm the second , but you do n't get to be a legend for that .
#Text=That 's okay though .
#Text=Jeong Jeong 's a firebending genius .
#Text=Some say he 's mad - but he 's not !
#Text=He 's enlightened .
#Text=" Aang says : " You mean there 's a firebender out here who 's not with the Fire Lord ?
#Text=We 've got ta go see him !
#Text=He can train me !
#Text=" Sokka says : " We 're not gon na go find some crazy firebender !
#Text=" Chey says : " He 's not crazy !
#Text=He 's a genius !
#Text=And he 's the perfect person to train the Avatar !
#Text=That 's why I followed you into the festival .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Look , thanks for the help , but we 're leaving for the North Pole in the morning .
#Text=" Aang says : " Sokka , this could be my only chance to meet a firebending master who would actually be willing to teach me .
#Text=" Katara says : " It ca n't hurt just to talk to him .
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's what you said about going to the festival !
#Text=Why does n't anyone ever listen to me ?
#Text=" Lin Yee says : " Do n't move !
#Text=" Lin Yee says : " Jeong Jeong told you not to look for Avatar !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hold on , you know these guys ?
#Text=" Chey says : " Oh yeh !
#Text=Lin Yee 's an old buddy !
#Text=Right , Lin Yee ?
#Text=" Lin Yee says : " Shut up !
#Text=Keep moving .
#Text=" Lin Yee says : " Go on .
#Text=He sees you only .
#Text=" Chey says : " Oh that 's okay , we can chat later .
#Text=" Aang says : " Is that where Jeong Jeong is ?
#Text=I need to talk to him right away .
#Text=" Lin Yee says : " No !
#Text=You wait there .
#Text=Go now !
#Text=" Chey says : " Do n't worry !
#Text=Everything 'll be fine .
#Text=He 's a great man , great man !
#Text=" Zhao says : " So , the Avatar was here and you let him slip away ?
#Text=" Guard captain says : " Yes , sir , but other than that the festival went off without a hitch !
#Text=No fights .
#Text=Theft was way down .
#Text=" Zhao says : " I do n't care about your local crime rates !
#Text=Which way did they go ?
#Text=" Guard captain says : " They headed into the forest , up the river I suspect .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Ready the river boats .
#Text=We 're going after the Avatar .
#Text=" Aang says : " What happened ?
#Text=Can I see Jeong Jeong now ?
#Text=" Chey says : " He wo n't see you .
#Text=He 's very angry that I brought you here .
#Text=He wants you to leave immediately .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Finally !
#Text=Let 's hit the road .
#Text=" Aang says : " Why wo n't he see me ?
#Text=" Chey says : " He says you 're not ready .
#Text=Says you have n't mastered waterbending and earthbending yet .
#Text=" Aang says : " Wait , how does he know that ?
#Text=" Chey says : " He saw the way you walked into camp .
#Text=He could tell .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm going in , anyway !
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Get out .
#Text=" Aang says : " Master , I need to learn firebending .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Only a fool seeks his own destruction .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm the Avatar , it 's my destiny to — " Jeong Jeong says : " Destiny ?
#Text=What would a boy know of destiny ?
#Text=If a fish lives its whole life in this river , does he know the river 's destiny ?
#Text=No !
#Text=Only that it runs on and on out of his control !
#Text=He may follow where it flows , but he can not see the end .
#Text=He can not imagine the ocean .
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay , but it 's the Avatar 's duty to master all of the bending disciplines .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " To master the bending disciplines , you must first master discipline itself .
#Text=But you have no interest in this , so I have no interest in you !
#Text=Now , get out .
#Text=" Aang says : " Please , I have to learn .
#Text=This could be my only chance .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Are you deaf ?
#Text=How can I teach you if you refuse to listen ?
#Text=Before learning firebending you must learn water and earth .
#Text=Water is cool and soothing , earth is steady and stable , but fire , fire is alive !
#Text=It breathes , it grows .
#Text=Without the bender , a rock will not throw itself !
#Text=But fire will spread and destroy everything in its path if one does not have the will to control it !
#Text=That is its destiny !
#Text=You are not ready !
#Text=You are too weak !
#Text=" Roku says : " You think I am weak ?
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Avatar Roku !
#Text=No , No !
#Text=I did not mean that .
#Text=" Roku says : " I have mastered the elements a thousand times in a thousand lifetimes .
#Text=Now , I must do it once again .
#Text=You will teach the Avatar firebending .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Yes , yes , I will teach you .
#Text=" Aang says : " Really ?
#Text=That 's great !
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Widen your stance .
#Text=Wider !
#Text=Bend your knees .
#Text=Now , concentrate .
#Text=Good , good !
#Text=" Aang says : " Wait !
#Text=What do I do now ?
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Silence !
#Text=Talking is not concentrating !
#Text=Look at your friend , is she talking ?
#Text=Even that oaf knows to concentrate on what he 's doing !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey !
#Text=" Aang says : " But what am I concentrating on ?
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Feel the heat of the sun .
#Text=It is the greatest source of fire .
#Text=Yet , it is in complete balance with nature !
#Text=" Aang says : " So when do I get to make some fire ?
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Concentrate !
#Text=" Aang says : " Are we coming up here so I do n't burn anything with my fire blasts ?
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " No fire yet .
#Text=" Aang says : " What ?
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Power in firebending comes from the breath .
#Text=That is why you must master proper breath control .
#Text=" Aang says : " You brought me up here to breathe ?
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Assume your stance .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Wider .
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're not even look — " Jeong Jeong says : " Wider !
#Text=Now , inhale through the nose and exhale through the mouth - without talking .
#Text=Good .
#Text=Keep going .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " What are you doing here ?
#Text=I did not tell you to stop !
#Text=" Aang says : " I 've been breathing for hours !
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " You want to stop breathing ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I want you to stop wasting my time !
#Text=I already know how to squat and breathe and feel the sun !
#Text=I wan na know how to shoot fire out of my fingertips !
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " I had a pupil once who had no interest in learning discipline .
#Text=He was only concerned with the power of fire - how he could use it to destroy his opponents and wipe out the obstacles in his path , but fire is a horrible burden to bear .
#Text=Its nature is to consume and without control it destroys everything around it .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Learn restraint , or risk destroying yourself and everything you love .
#Text=" Aang says : " I thought about what you said , I promise I 'll be more patient .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " We 're going to work with fire now .
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh yeah !
#Text=I mean , let us begin .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Concentrate on the fire .
#Text=I want you to keep the flame from reaching the edges of the leaf for as long as you can .
#Text=" Tribal man says : " Master !
#Text=There is trouble .
#Text=" Aang says : " What 's going on ?
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Concentrate on your leaf !
#Text=" Aang says : " This is the worst firebending instruction ever !
#Text=All he does is leave me for hours to concentrate or breathe !
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm sure there 's a good reason .
#Text=" Aang says : " But I 'm ready to do so much more .
#Text=" Aang says : " I did it !
#Text=I made fire !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , that 's great , but you should take it slow .
#Text=" Aang says : " Now that 's some firebending !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , you 'll hurt yourself !
#Text=" Aang says : " I wonder how that juggler did it .
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara !
#Text=I 'm so sorry !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Katara , what 's wrong ?
#Text=What did you do ?!
#Text=" Aang says : " It was an accident !
#Text=I was , uh ... Katara , I 'm so -- " Sokka says : " I told you we should n't mess around with this !
#Text=Look what you did !
#Text=You burned my sister !
#Text=You burned my sister !
#Text=This is all your fault !
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " I know !
#Text=Now pack your things .
#Text=You must leave immediately .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm sorry , I did n't ... I 'm sorry !
#Text="
